sentences.sContent: He received a paltry annuity of $100.
sentences.sCn: 他收到了微不足道的100美元年金。

synos.tran: [劳经]年金，养老金；年金保险；年金享受权

remMethod.val: annu (年) + ity → 一年发一次的钱 → 年金

words.tran: 领年金者；领受养老金者

trans.tranCn: 年金， 养老金； 年金享受权
trans.tranOther: a fixed amount of money that is paid each year to someone, usually until they die
